description: The promise of deeper trade and investment ties is key to Anwar's strategy to win over voters Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: New global reality, not alignments, behind Malaysia’s pursuit of Brics membership
title_page: New global reality, not alignments, behind Malaysia’s pursuit of Brics membership | The Straits Times
maintext:
KUALA LUMPUR – Malaysia’s declared desire to join the Brics grouping – most recently espoused during a visit by Russian Foreign Minister Sergei Lavrov to Kuala Lumpur on July 28 – is deepening concerns over whether Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim is leaning away from Western powers.
In his 20 months in power, Datuk Seri Anwar has staunchly condemned the United States and other allies of Israel over the prolonged conflict in Gaza, and repeatedly defended Beijing against “China-phobia”.
